menu.title: Menu 'Fitness'
menu.descr: The Fitness menu is a new approach to cooking: more fresh fruits and vegetables. The product of active and healthy people. It is a completely new product with optimal price and high quality!

menu.title: Menu 'Lenten'
menu.descr: The Lenten menu is a careful selection of ingredients: no animal products at all, milk made from almonds, oats, coconut or buckwheat, the right amount of protein through tofu and imported vegetarian steaks.

menu.title: Menu 'Premium'
menu.descr: In the “Premium” menu we use not only beautiful packaging design, but also high-quality execution of dishes. Red fish, seafood, fruits - a restaurant menu without going to a restaurant!
